name: Fast as Lightning
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: Apply the “After the attack” text of your resolved or discarded red card.
_(If it has radius, use that card's value.)_

name: Chop Down
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Apply the “After the attack” text of your resolved or discarded red card.

name: Smoke Bomb
text:
Place a ::token_smoke_bomb:: smoke bomb token in radius;
enemy heroes cannot target another you or another unit if there is the Smoke Bomb on a straight line between that enemy hero and their target.

name: Flurry of blows
text: Each time after you perform an attack action, you may repeat it once on a different target.

name: Trip Mine
text: Place 2 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 1 ::token_dud:: dud, facedown in radius; units may move through them; remove mine tokens after an enemy hero moves through them; for every blast removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

name: Crane Stance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

name: Poof!
text:
Swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in range;
if you do, block the attack.

name: Cluster Mine
text:
Place 3 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 2 ::token_dud::
duds, facedown in radius; units may move through them; remove mine tokens after an enemy hero moves through them; for every blast removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

name: Tiger Stance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space to a space adjacent to the target. Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

name: Vanish
text:
Swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in range;
if you do, block the attack.

name: Death Grenade
text: Place a ::token_grenade:: Grenade token into a space in radius. **End of turn:** Up to 1 enemy hero adjacent to that token discards a card, or is defeated. Remove the Grenade token.

name: Viper Stance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in radius.

name: Minefield
text:
Place 3 mine tokens, 2 ::token_blast:: blasts and 1 ::token_dud::
dud, facedown in radius; units may move through them; remove mien tokens after an enemy hero moves through them; for every blast removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

name: Dragon Stance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 or 2 spaces to a space adjacent to the target. Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

name: Ruse
text:
Swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in range;
if you do, block the attack. You may place the Smoke bomb into a space in range.

name: Holy Death Grenade
text: Place a ::token_grenade:: grenade token into a space in radius. **End of turn:** Up to 2 enemy heroes adjacent to that token discard a card, or are defeated. Remove the Grenade token.

name: Cobra Stance
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb radius; if you do, you may place the Smoke bomb into a space in radius.

name: Perfect Self
text:
**Choose one, or both —**
-  **This round:** Double your item bonuses.
-  Take a Tier II card from your deck and add it to your dashboard as a permanent item.
